item.title: Easy Hacktivitycon Challenges
item.description: Author: Aki Hakune Started writing on September 18th 2021. Warmups - Tsunami Downloading the file and running file command, we get its file type - an audio file. Let’s think simple, and straight up open it in an audio editor - here I choose the open-source Audacity. And that’s it, we got the flag! Warmups - Pimple Follow the exact same procedure as Tsunami, we have: Okay so what’s a GIMP XCF image?
